Brock University Subreddit Chrome Extension

Keep up with the fast-paced university lifestyle by using this extension to quickly browse brocku.reddit.com! Think of it as a minimalist version of /r/brocku. You can also search, make a submission of the current page, and receive desktop notifications of newly submitted stories.

This extension was made during the St. Catharines 2012 Hackathon.
See the code at https://github.com/dideler/brocku-reddit-for-chrome

Disclaimer: not an official product of Brock University

** Revision log **
v2.0.0:
- Upgraded to Extension Manifest v2
- Fixed bug related to fetching links from RSS feed
- Improved formatting and styling

v1.2:
- Cleaned up code that deals with updating the feed
- Fixed auto refresh bug (https://github.com/dideler/brocku-reddit-for-chrome/issues/2)

v1.1:
- Cleaned up the code
- Fixed notification bug (https://github.com/dideler/brocku-reddit-for-chrome/issues/1)
- Added option to clear temporary storage (i.e. everything except the settings)

v1.0:
- First release!
